name: The Qubofall (Demo)
description:
Demo version of The Qubofall is now available on itch.io!

The Qubofall is a online multiplayer, first person block party game which you can play with other people. The owner of the room must start the game to get to the game area. You must stand on the block with the right color that indicated at the top left corner before the timer runs out to not get eliminated. The game continues until the round is over. When the game is over, you will be teleported to the main area, and the winner displayed at the top of the screen.

The Qubofall's Features

  • You can play with other people and gain score
  • You can chat with other people and whisper them
  • You can kick the people out of the room (Only the owner of the room can do this.)
  • You can set the shape of the blocks, rounds, tile size etc.

More features may be added later, only the demo shown.
